	"$schema": "http://adaptivecards.io/schemas/adaptive-card.json",
	"type": "AdaptiveCard",
	"version": "1.0",
	"body": [
        {
			"type": "TextBlock",
			"text": "When did the accident took place?"
		},
		{
			"type": "Input.Date",
			"placeholder": "Due Date",
			"id": "DateVal",
			"value": "2017-09-20"
		},
        {
			"type": "TextBlock",
			"text": "How did the accident happen ?"
		},
        {
            "type": "Input.Text",
            "placeholder": "Comments",
            "style": "text",
            "isMultiline": true,
            "maxLength": 0,
            "id": "MultiLineVal"
        }
	],
	"actions": [
		{
			"type": "Action.Submit",
			"title": "Submit",
			"data": {
				"id": "1234567890"
			}
		}
	]
}"}],"label":"Accident info form"},{"id":"241c92fab3ad-cd222572b04b62e8-a5f7","type":"statement","designer":{"xLocation":449,"yLocation":200},"text":"Thank you for filling in the details!

","variable":"isAccidental","stringId":"stringId_00cbf3c25d8f5d24","targetStepId":"0cbcee7d50b1-7c891654d26c114d-9683"},{"id":"aa186dba36b9-3e798a0f52fa2f2f-1df0","type":"statement","designer":{"xLocation":450,"yLocation":47,"next":"0685db70fbe1-bfdc24ba336cc80c-c0bb"},"text":"Now, please attach the itemized bill. 
Your bill must contain all of the following information:
- Name of the member who incurred the expense
- Name, address, and tax identification number of the provider
- Date and charge for each service rendered ","stringId":"stringId_8ad78d19e161a69f"},{"id":"6db10f8749a2-f1e702e3912394fd-6240","type":"action","label":"Create claim summary","designer":{"xLocation":453,"yLocation":140,"next":"241c92fab3ad-cd222572b04b62e8-a5f7"},"onInit":"/*
 * Use the following variable notation:
 * 
 * ${var} = scenario local variables
 * &{var} = user data variables
 * @{var} = global conversation variables
 * 
 * Available object to use in the code:
 * require, session, moment, builder, next(), setTimeout, underscore
 * 
 * Hit 'Ctrl + Space' for autocomplete
 * 
 * Example: ${welcomeMessage} = "Hello " + ${name}
*/
${refNumber} = '1-22-333-4444'
${claimSummary} = 
'Prefix and ID number: '+ ${userId} + 
'\nInsurance group number: '+${userGroupNumber} + 
'\nProvider name: '+${providerName} +
'\nService location: '+ ${serviceLocation}.entity;

if (${isAccidental}) {
    ${claimSummary} += 
'\nAccident Date: ' + JSON.parse(${accidentInfo}).DateVal + 
'\nAccident Information:' + JSON.parse(${accidentInfo}).MultiLineVal
}

"}],"returningMessage":"","interrupting":false,"breaking":false}
